gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency
Interface ILegendAddible

All Superinterfaces:
IOverlayAddible
All Known Implementing Classes:
FunctionViewComponent
public interface ILegendAddible
extends IOverlayAddible

This interface is implemented by view components that utilize the LegendOverlay.

See Also:
AxisOverlay2D

Method Summary

          This method will return the font used on by the overlays.

          This method will return the graphic associated with a graph for the Legend.

          This method will get the selected graphs for the Legend.

Method Detail

getGraphData

GraphData getGraphData(int graph)
This method will return the graphic associated with a graph for the Legend.

Returns:
The graphic for the Legend.

getText

java.lang.String getText(int graph)
This method will get the text that is associated with a graph for the Legend.

Returns:
The text for the Legend.

getSelectedGraphs

int[] getSelectedGraphs()
This method will get the selected graphs for the Legend.

Returns:
The number of graphs for the Legend.

getFont

java.awt.Font getFont()
This method will return the font used on by the overlays. The legend overlay will call this to determine what font to use.

Returns:
The display font.
